name: DIFF
purpose: Using a process similar to the SNDX() function, this function will return a value that can be used to determine how ‘close’ the two values ‘sound.’

parts.description: Comparison value 1. Must be type A.
Comparison value 2. Must be type A.

return_type: I The return value is from 0 thru 4. 0 is no match at all; 4 is a very close match.
